name: Zombie Apocalypse
description: Improve your weapons or buy new weapons to survive in this action-packed atmosphere of zombie limbs and blood! Use equipment, special powers and weapons add-ons!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Dual-Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9 compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 190 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Dual-Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Video card must be 2048 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9 compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 190 MB available space Sound Card: Any
